name: MMA Fighting 3D
description:
Join one of the most prestigious tournaments with MMA Immortals fight 3D. Here you will have a chance to fight with greatest wrestling warriors from fighting club. Start your MMA training right now and become one of the boxing champions.

HOW TO WIN?
- Choose one of the wrestling warriors for real fight;
- Begin from the MMA training with other boxing champions;
- Become strong enough to join the kickboxing tournament;
- Rise to the top of the boxing champions leaderboard;
- Win all wrestling revolution battles and get the Trophy.


MMA Immortals fight 3D FEATURES:

- 2 great wrestling revolution Tournaments to take part;
- Powerful boxing champions from the fighting club;
- Hard MMA training before the wrestling fight;
- Furious real boxing battles with other wrestling warriors;
- Chance to become a fighting club champion.

Win the wrestling revolution Tournament and get the great Trophy with MMA Immortals fight 3D!
